data.actual_result: Masked links are not parsed at all. Probably related to other embed-related bugs.
data.expected_result: Masked links are parsed as such on Android, like they are on desktop.
data.short_description: Masked links are not parsed in embed fields
data.steps_to_repro: - Create embed with a field of value ``[Test](https://google.com/)`` (https://p.teknik.io/bSSQn for an example) - That's it
